item.title: Reflection on my Bug Bounty Journey 2022
item.author: Siva Rajendran
item.description: Last year with Synack Red Team has been a wholesome experience for me.

item.title: How I cleared OSCP in my First Attempt
item.author: Siva Rajendran
item.description: In this blog, I am going to share my experience on OSCP and provide you guys some tip which might be useful for those who are preparaing for their OSCP exam. Since I took the recent OSCP exam which Includes the Active Directory structure as well. I would share some tips on this part as well.
